department: Health Canada- Public Health Agency of Canada
description: Implement User Experience (UX) research and make recommendations for performance improvement on selected Canada.ca health-related web content.
duration_in_months: Well the data is in JSON format and it appears to be a tender notice for a User Experience (UX) Services contract. Here is the reformatted data in the requested JSON output format. Let me break it down into sections for clarity.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

#### Reference Number: cb-5519-52546577

**User Experience (UX) Services**

The Communications and Public Affairs Branch (CPAB) at Health Canada (HC) invites qualified Tenderers to submit a proposal for the provision of User Experience (UX) services. The objective of the project is to measure the effectiveness and efficiency of online health-related information and services provided by Health Canada and the Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) to Canadians.

**Description of the Services:**

The project requires a contractor to provide UX services for selected Canada.ca health-related web content. The contractor will be responsible for conducting user research to validate that users can effectively and efficiently find, understand, and use the information and services provided through the website. The services will include:

* Conducting user research to identify areas for improvement
* Analyzing data to determine how users interact with the website
* Providing recommendations to improve user experience

**Scope of Work:**

The contract will be awarded for a one-year period, with three optional one-year periods. The work will be completed under the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) method of supply.

**Eligibility:**

The tender is open only to those providers who have been pre-qualified and hold a TBIPS Supply Arrangement (SA) in Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region.

**Requirements:**

* The contractor must have expertise in user experience research and analysis
* The contractor must have experience working with government organizations
* The contractor must be able to provide detailed reports and recommendations to improve user experience

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* The contractor will be evaluated on their expertise in user experience research and analysis
* The contractor will be evaluated on their experience working with government organizations
* The contractor will be evaluated on their ability to provide detailed reports and recommendations

**Tender Submission:**

Tenderers must submit their proposals in both French and English. The deadline for submission is June 1st, 2023, at 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT).

**Contact Information:**

For more information, please contact Christopher Sparks, Contracting Authority, at (613) 296-1178 or christopher.sparks@hc-sc.gc.ca. Note that "Buy and Sell" is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents.

[Return to.main menu](/Govenment%20Procurement%20Tenders%20Papers) 

### Reminder: Submission Deadline is June 1st,
